abstract: ABP, a Dutch pension fund, is suing Bank of America over its controversial 2008 takeover of Merrill Lynch, accusing the bank of withholding material information about the deal, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Dutch Pension Fund Sues BofA Over Merrill Deal
